      • evaluate

        public static void evaluate(TypedAST ast)
        First typechecks the AST, then executes it. Any returned value is discarded, but anything printed to stdout will be visible.
        Parameters:
        ast -

      • evaluateNew

        public static Value evaluateNew(TypedAST ast)
        First typechecks the AST, then executes it. If any file is loaded, it is parsed by the new parser. Any returned value is returned, and anything printed to stdout will be visible.
        Parameters:
        ast -
